attributes.action: put the horrors in the next honours list
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the rock band the Horrors should be in the next honours list for services to music and fashion. They are five men under the stage names: Faris Rotter, Joshua von Grimm, Spider Webb, Coffin Joe, Tomethy Furse

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
